item.title: The Enigma of the Unfinished Kailasa Temple, Ellora
item.description: The Kailasa Temple at Ellora, carved from a single massive rock in Maharashtra, India, stands as one of the greatest architectural and engineering marvels of the ancient world. Dedicated to Lord Shiva, the temple forms part of the Ellora Caves, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Unlike most temples that were built by adding material, this one was created through monolithic excavation—workers remo
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: Bangalore to Tiruttani Solo Travel Plan
item.description: Tiruttani is a significant pilgrimage destination in Tamil Nadu, known for its ancient temple dedicated to Lord Murugan. As a solo traveler, you'll have the opportunity to immerse yourself in the spiritual ambiance of the temple town, explore its cultural heritage and witness the rituals and traditions firsthand.
